appendOutputHash.description: Appends version hash to the output bundled files if 'platformTarget' value is web.

assets.description: List of assets to be copied to bundle output location.

from.description: The source file, it can be absolute or relative path or glob pattern.

to.description: Custom output file name if from is a single file (not glob), otherwise output directory.

banner.description:
Banner text to add at the top of each generated bundle files.
It can be file name or banner raw text.
For example, 'banner.txt'.

baseHref.description: The base URL for all relative URLs on a page.

bundleAnalyzerOptions.description:
Webpack Bundle analyzer options.
This option is only used by webpack.

disableDefaultWebpackConfigs.description: If true, only custom webpack config is processed.

dlls.description:
The vendor module entries for dll bundle. If entry ends with .ts, path will be resolved from app root,
otherwise from project root.

entry.description: The main entry file to be bundled.

envOverrides.description: To override properties based on build targets.

extends.description: Extends the project config from another one. Use the name property of another project config.

externals.description: The externals configuration option provides a way of excluding dependencies from the output bundle.

extractCss.description: If true, build process will extracts css specified in styles entry as styles.css.

globalConstants.description: Allows you to create global constants which can be configured at compile time.

globalProvides.description: To load global modules automatically  with alias key.

inlineChunkName.description: The output chunk name for inline.

jsSourceMapExcludes.description: Specifies a list of files to be excluded from javascript source map loader. Paths will be resolved to project root.

libraryName.description: The libraryName is used depending on the value of the 'libraryTarget' options.

moduleReplacements.description:
Replaces resources with new resources.
This option is only used by webpack.

name.description: The ref name for this project config.

outDir.description:
The output directory for build results.
Path must be relative path to project root.
If not specified, default to ./dist folder.
If not specified and 'srcDir' is libs/core, then 'outDir' will be dist/core.

outFileName.description: The output bundle file name for main entry.

platformTarget.description:
Tells the build system which platform environment the application is targeting.
This option is only used by webpack.

polyfills.description:
The polyfill entries for app. If entry ends with .ts, path will be resolved from app root,
otherwise from project root.

polyfillsChunkName.description: The output chunk name for polyfills.

preserveLicenseComments.description: If true, preserve license comments when minfying.

preserveSymlinks.description:
Whether to resolve symlinks to their symlinked location.
This option is only used by webpack.

publicPath.description: The url where files will be deployed.

referenceDll.description: To consume  dll bundle created by the dll build.

lazy.description: If true, it will be lazy loaded, and will not be injected to target html.

skip.description: If true, this config will be skipped by the build process.

sourceMap.description: If true, sourcemaps will be generated.

sourceMapDevTool.description:
This option controls if and how source maps are generated.
This option is only used by webpack.

sourceMapFallbackModuleFilenameTemplate.description:
A fallback used when the template string of 'sourceMapFilenameTemplate' yields duplicates.
This option is only used by webpack.

sourceMapModuleFilenameTemplate.description:
Customize the names used in each source map.
This option is only used by webpack.

srcDir.description:
The root src folder of your project. Example: 'src' or 'lib' or 'client' or 'packages/core'.
Path must be relative path to project root.
By default project root is cwd in cli, or it can be passed as a parameter to javascript api.
Usually 'srcDir' is refer to a folder containing your typescript source files.
If not specified, and main 'entry' is present, default to the directory of main entry,
otherwise, project root is used.

stats.description:
The webpack stats option lets you precisely control what bundle information gets displayed.
This option is only used by webpack.

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors

styles.description:
List of global style entries to be transpiled and copied to bundle output location.
Default supported styles are .css, .scss/.sass and .less.

from.description: The source style file, it can be .scss/.sass, .less or .css

tsLoader.description:
Typescript loader for webpack.
This option is only used by webpack.

vendorChunk.description: If true, requested modules started with node_modules path are chunk into [vendorChunkName].js.

vendorChunkName.description: The output chunk name for vendor or dll chunk.

vendorChunkPaths.description: Additional module paths to be chunk into vendor. Paths are relative to srcDir.

webpackConfig.description: Custom webpack config file to be merged. Path will be resolved to project root.

stats.description:
The webpack stats option lets you precisely control what bundle information gets displayed.
This option is only used by webpack.

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors

styles.description:
List of global style entries to be transpiled and copied to bundle output location.
Default supported styles are .css, .scss/.sass and .less.

from.description: The source style file, it can be .scss/.sass, .less or .css

tsLoader.description:
Typescript loader for webpack.
This option is only used by webpack.

vendorChunk.description: If true, requested modules started with node_modules path are chunk into [vendorChunkName].js.

vendorChunkName.description: The output chunk name for vendor or dll chunk.

vendorChunkPaths.description: Additional module paths to be chunk into vendor. Paths are relative to srcDir.

webpackConfig.description: Custom webpack config file to be merged. Path will be resolved to project root.

filter.description: Project filter to build only specific app(s) or lib(s). Specifies target app or lib project name(s).

production.description: Set true for production build target.

verbose.description: If true, the console displays detailed diagnostic information.

generateStatsFile.description: If `true`, Webpack Stats JSON file will be generated in bundles output directory.

openAnalyzer.description: If true, automatically open report in default browser.

reportFilename.description:
Path to bundle report file that will be generated in `static` mode.
Relative to bundles output directory.

statsFilename.description:
Name of Webpack Stats JSON file that will be generated if `generateStatsFile` is `true`.
Relative to bundles output directory.

statsOptions.description: The stats option lets you precisely control what bundle information gets displayed by the analyzer.

addPureAnnotations.description: Adds `@__PURE__` annotation comments to IIFEs for library bundle with es5 target and umd format.

entry.description:
Custom main entry file name, if not present, main entry will be used.
If 'entryResolution' is present, path will be resolved from 'entryResolution.entryRoot'.

entryResolution.description: Custom entry resolution for bundling. If not specified, main entry is used.

bundleTargetIndex.description:
If 'bundleTargets' is array, name or array index can be specified.
If not specified, previous item will be used.

tsTranspilationIndex.description:
If 'tsTranspilations' is array, name or array index can be specified.
If not specified, first item will be used.

inlineResources.description: If true, templateUrl and styleUrls will be inlined.

name.description: Name for describing or referencing this target.

outDir.description: Custom output directory for bundled results.

scriptTarget.description: Transforms entry file or bundled result to specific ECMA script target.

transformScriptTargetOnly.description: If true, the process will perform script target transformation only.

assets.description: List of assets to be copied to bundle output location.

from.description: The source file, it can be absolute or relative path or glob pattern.

to.description: Custom output file name if from is a single file (not glob), otherwise output directory.

banner.description:
Banner text to add at the top of each generated bundle files.
It can be file name or banner raw text.
For example, 'banner.txt'.

Webpack Bundle analyzer options.
This option is only used by webpack.

cleanFiles.description: Files to clean after all build tasks.

disableDefaultWebpackConfigs.description: If true, only custom webpack config is processed.

entry.description: The main entry file to be bundled.

envOverrides.description: To override properties based on build target environments.

extends.description: Extends the project config from another one. Use the name property of another project config.

externals.description: The externals configuration option provides a way of excluding dependencies from the output bundle.

includeAngularAndRxJsExternals.description: If true, default Angular and RxJs global module names are added as externals.

libraryName.description: The libraryName is used depending on the value of the 'libraryTarget' options.

Replaces resources with new resources.
This option is only used by webpack.

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors

styles.description:
List of global style entries to be transpiled and copied to bundle output location.
Default supported styles are .css, .scss/.sass and .less.

from.description: The source style file, it can be .scss/.sass, .less or .css

tsLoader.description:
Typescript loader for webpack.
This option is only used by webpack.

webpackConfig.description: Custom webpack config file to be merged. Path will be resolved to project root.

es2015.description: The es2015 module index for package.json file.

main.description: The main index for package.json file.

module.description: The esm module index for package.json file.

typings.description: The typings index for package.json file.

packageConfigFile.description: The source package.json file to be updated and copied.

outFileName.description: Custom output file anme. Can use [package-name] as a package name placeholder.

tsTranspilationIndex.description:
If 'tsTranspilations' is array, name or array index can be specified.
If not specified, first item will be used.

useRootPackageConfigVerion.description: If true, update version in package.json with project root package.json's version.

hints.description:
Turns hints on/off. In addition, tells webpack to throw either an error or a warning when hints are
found. This property is set to "warning" by default.

maxAssetSize.description:
An asset is any emitted file from webpack. This option controls when webpack emits a performance hint
based on individual asset size. The default value is 250000 (bytes).

maxEntrypointSize.description:
An entrypoint represents all assets that would be utilized during initial load time for a specific entry.
This option controls when webpack should emit performance hints based on the maximum entrypoint size.
The default value is 250000 (bytes).

includePaths.description: An array of paths that LibSass can look in to attempt to resolve your @import declarations.

copyTemplateAndStyleUrls.description: If true, templateUrl and styleUrls resources are copy into output locations.

inlineMetaDataResources.description: If true, templateUrl and styleUrls resources of .metadata.json are inlined.

name.description: Name for describing or referencing this transpilation.

outDir.description: Output directory for this transpilation. Path will be relative to outDir of library project config.

tsconfig.description: Typescript configuration file for this transpilation.

cached.description: Add information about cached (not built) modules

chunkModules.description: Add built modules information to chunk information

chunkOrigins.description: Add the origins of chunks and chunk merging info

chunks.description: Add chunk information (setting this to `false` allows for a less verbose output)

chunksSort.description: Sort the chunks by a field

errorDetails.description: Add details to errors (like resolving log)

hash.description: Add the hash of the compilation

modulesSort.description: Sort the modules by a field

reasons.description: Add information about the reasons why modules are included

source.description: Add the source code of modules

cached.description: Add information about cached (not built) modules

chunkModules.description: Add built modules information to chunk information

chunkOrigins.description: Add the origins of chunks and chunk merging info

chunks.description: Add chunk information (setting this to `false` allows for a less verbose output)

chunksSort.description: Sort the chunks by a field

errorDetails.description: Add details to errors (like resolving log)

hash.description: Add the hash of the compilation

modulesSort.description: Sort the modules by a field

reasons.description: Add information about the reasons why modules are included

source.description: Add the source code of modules

aggregateTimeout.description:
Add a delay before rebuilding once the first file changed. This allows webpack to aggregate any other
changes made during this time period into one rebuild.
Pass a value in milliseconds. Default: 300.

ignored.description:
For some systems, watching many file systems can result in a lot of CPU or memory usage.
It is possible to exclude a huge folder like node_modules.
It is also possible to use anymatch patterns.

poll.description: Turn on polling by passing true, or specifying a poll interval in milliseconds.
